oml:data_set_description.oml:name: baseball-team
oml:data_set_description.oml:description:
**Author**: Lorraine Denby **Source**: [StatLib](http://lib.stat.cmu.edu/datasets/) **Please cite**:
**Analysis of Baseball Salary Data: Team statistics** This analysis describes and summarizes the relationships between 1987 salaries of major league baseball players and the player's performance. The salary data were taken from Sports Illustrated, April 20, 1987. The salary of any player not included in that article is listed as an NA. The 1986 and career statistics were taken from The 1987 Baseball Encyclopedia Update published by Collier Books, Macmillan Publishing Company, New York. The team attendance figures were obtained from the Elias Sports Bureau, personal conversation.
oml:data_set_description.oml:creator: Lorraine Denby
